explanation: [0-0] Two young men are standing in the living room of a room. The living room has a gray sofa. A man wearing a black top and brown shorts with white socks is standing in front of the sofa. His right foot is stepping on a skateboard with a yellow tennis ball on it. Next to it is a tennis ball bucket filled with tennis balls. A man in a gray top is standing behind the sofa, holding a tennis racket and looking forward. There are many decorative paintings hanging on the wall of the room, and white cabinets at the back.

[0-4] Then the man in the black top stepped on one end of the skateboard with his right foot, making the skateboard perpendicular to the ground, and the tennis ball on the skateboard flew backwards. Immediately afterwards, the man in the gray top behind the sofa raised his racket, caught the flying tennis ball, and hit it forward at the same time. The tennis ball landed on the edge of the tennis ball bucket on the mat. The two men raised their hands in surprise and opened their mouths wide.
